assignments.description: Adds the newly assigned Actual Cost value to a record collection variable that will be used for the update.
assignments.name: Add_LF_Record_to_Update_Variable
assignments.label: Add LF Record to Update Variable

assignments.description: Adds the Exp Code updates to a record collection variable that will be used to update records when the loop is done.
assignments.name: Add_TLI_to_Update_Var
assignments.label: Add Transaction to Update Variable

assignments.description: Assigns the choices you just made to the transaction record in the uncoded transaction variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Choices_to_Transaction
assignments.label: Assign Choices to Transaction

assignments.description: Counts the number of LF records in the record collection.
assignments.name: Count_of_LF_Records
assignments.label: Count of LF Records

assignments.description: Counts the transaction line item records in the entire collection. This is not really needed.
assignments.name: Count_of_Transaction_Records
assignments.label: Count of Transaction Records

collectionProcessors.description: Creates a filter of just the transactions for this year that are still uncoded at this point.
collectionProcessors.name: Filter_Just_This_Year_Still_Uncoded
collectionProcessors.label: Filter - Just This Year Still Uncoded

collectionProcessors.description: Filters Transactions (from just this year's event) to just the category on the current LF record
collectionProcessors.name: Filter_to_just_this_category
collectionProcessors.label: Filter to just this category

collectionProcessors.description: Filters the transactions in the record collection down to just the one's that have an Exp Year matching the current event's year.
collectionProcessors.name: Filter_Transactions_Just_This_Year
collectionProcessors.label: Filter - Transactions Just This Year

decisions.description: Decision to code the uncoded transactions or not
decisions.name: decision_code_them
decisions.label: Code them?

decisions.description: Checks if there are uncoded transactions and bypasses the Uncoded Transaction Loop if none found.
decisions.name: Uncoded_Transactions_Found
decisions.label: Uncoded Transactions Found?

Flow.description: Updates the Actuals in the Logistics Financials records associated with this event.

formulas.description: Returns Jan 1 for the year of the event.
formulas.name: f_First_Day_of_Event_Year

formulas.description: Displays Jan 1 of the year prior to the event year.
formulas.name: f_FirstDayofYearBeforeEvent

formulas.description: Gives you the total that's in the GL that has no category yet.
formulas.name: f_Total_Trans_minus_categorized

formulas.description: Link to a Salesforce report of the uncoded actuals for this event.
formulas.name: f_Uncoded_Actuals_Link

Flow.label: Event or Conference - SF - Update Actuals

loops.description: Loops through the LF collection and assigns new values to actual cost.
loops.name: Update_Actuals_Loop
loops.label: Update Actuals Loop

recordLookups.description: Gets the event record that was clicked in from.
recordLookups.name: Get_Event_Record
recordLookups.label: Get Event Record

recordLookups.description: Gets the logistics financials records associated with the event (up to 100).
recordLookups.name: Get_Logistics_Financials
recordLookups.label: Get Logistics Financials

recordLookups.description: Gets the first 600 records of transaction line items in the related GL going back two years. Hopefully this is everything for the event.
recordLookups.name: Get_Transactions
recordLookups.label: Get Transactions

recordLookups.description: Gets the first 600 records of transactions in the related GL going back two years, limited just to ones that don't have the Exp Code set where the year matches the event year. This should hopefully include all of the transactions in this GL account that are for this event.
recordLookups.name: Get_Uncoded_Transactions
recordLookups.label: Get Uncoded Transactions

fields.name: Display_Text_Are_You_Sure
fields.fieldText:
Event: {!Get_Event_Record.Name}

Current Actual Sum: {!Sum_LF_Actuals}

Updated Actual Sum: {!Filter_Sum_Just_This_Year}

fields.name: display_text_data_summary
fields.fieldText:
Data Summary:

Total accumulated costs in {!Get_Event_Record.GL_Account__r.Name}: {!Sum_of_Transactions} ({!var_count_transaction_line_items} records)

Uncoded: {!Sum_of_Just_This_Year_Still_Uncoded}

Data pulled back to: {!f_FirstDayofYearBeforeEvent}

fields.name: display_text_are_you_sure_final
fields.fieldText: Update actuals for {!var_count_logistics_financials} logistics financials records?

fields.name: display_text_event_name
fields.fieldText:
This will update Logistics Financials with the actuals from Finance.


Continue?

fields.name: display_text_grabbing_GL_code
fields.fieldText: Error: GL Account (Cost) not set for {!Get_Event_Record.Name}

fields.name: Display_Text_You_Did_it
fields.fieldText:
Actuals have been updated for {!Get_Event_Record.Name}


View Report

fields.name: display_text_you_have_uncoded
fields.fieldText:
{!var_count_of_uncoded_transacations} uncoded transactions have been found.


View Report

fields.name: Display_Text_Uncoded_Found
fields.fieldText:
Uncoded Transaction

Date: {!Uncoded_Transaction_Loop.Transaction_Date__c}

Document Description: {!Uncoded_Transaction_Loop.Document_Description__c}

Document Reference: {!Uncoded_Transaction_Loop.Document_Reference__c}

Line Description: {!Uncoded_Transaction_Loop.c2g__LineDescription__c}

Amount: {!Uncoded_Transaction_Loop.c2g__HomeValue__c}

transforms.description: Sum of the Actuals of the Logistics Financial records on this event.
transforms.name: Sum_LF_Actuals
transforms.label: Sum LF Actuals

transforms.name: Sum_of_Just_This_Year_Still_Uncoded
transforms.label: Sum of Just This Year Still Uncoded

transforms.description: Sums up all the transactions in the record collection (all years).
transforms.name: Sum_of_Transactions
transforms.label: Sum of Transactions

variables.description: Variable to contain the one LF record that say Uncoded in the category
variables.name: var_Uncoded_LF_Record
